Beijing Hua tong ren shi chang xin xi you xian ze ren gong si
citeinfo.title: China County Boundaries with 1990 Population Census Data (Part A)

serinfo.sername: Historical China County Population Census Data with GIS Maps

descript.abstract: REMOTE DOWNLOAD NOT AVAILABLE - please contact data@library.columbia.edu for access. China County Boundaries with 1990 Population Census Data (Part A) is a polygon theme representing counties in China in the year 1990. Attribute information includes population variables from the 1990 census.
descript.purpose: The data set was developed for display and analysis using GIS.

cntorgp.cntorg: China Data Center - University of Michigan

idinfo.native: Microsoft Windows XP Version 5.1 (Build 2600) Service Pack 3; ESRI ArcCatalog 9.3.1.1850

procstep.procdesc: The 1990 and 2000 administrative maps were primarily based on the "The Administrative Maps of the People's Republic of China, published by China Map Press, and some other yearly administrative maps

cntorgp.cntorg: China Data Center - University of Michigan
